short_summary: Procurement of Lab Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies
description: The department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 45 Sacr\u00e9-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6 within 12 weeks of contract award.
duration_in_months: It is not clear from the text of the tender notice to what extent the student ID will be used for.
full_summary:
#Government Tender Announcement#

##Summary of Requirements##

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the acquisition of three (3) Flash Point Testers, including installation and training to replace existing test equipment. The test equipment is currently in use at three (3) locations: FP56 (DND Headquarters), FP92 (DDESE) and FP93 (Canadian Forces Development Centre).

##Notice of Proposed Procurement##

This request is published through an electronic bidding process under the Supply Arrangement (AMA) E60PV-19EQUI, for a minimum of 15 calendar days as per applicable trade agreements. Suppliers who are pre-qualified under the AMA E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to participate.

##Competitive Procurement Strategy##

The selection criteria is based on the lowest priced responsive proposal.

##Additional Requirements##

* Suppliers must be pre-qualified under the AMA E60PV-19EQUI for the acquisition of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies.
* The procurement is subject to applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement and Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
* The procurement is reserved for suppliers who are currently pre-qualified under the AMA E60PV-19EQUI.

##Contact Information##

* Contracting Authority: Myriam Zakaib, Department of National Defence, (343) 572-4864, Myriam.Zakaib@forces.gc.ca
* Tender Documents: Available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) and CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba)

##Closing Date and Time##

October 20, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

This request is issued by the Department of National Defence under the Supply Arrangement (AMA) E60PV-19EQUI. Suppliers who are interested in participating in this procurement are required to be pre-qualified under the AMA E60PV-19EQUI for the acquisition of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies. The procurement is subject to applicable trade agreements and is reserved for suppliers who are currently pre-qualified under the AMA E60PV-19EQUI. Suppliers who are interested in participating in this procurement must submit their bid electronically through the Government Electronic
